item.content:encoded:
Get Well Soon, Take This One Day at a Time Card

Review Get Well Soon, Take This One Day at a Time Card – Get Well Cards Get Well Soon, Take This One Day at a Time Card ready to ship the fastest Get Well Soon, Take This One Day at a Time Card order now with fast delivery service to your hand as soon as possibleEncourage someone recovering from an illness or injury to stay in the moment and give themselves times to heal with this custom front calligraphy typography design featuring the message, "CUSTOM NAME HERE Take this one day a a time." Design is accented by beautiful blue flowers in upper right and lower left corner of card. Inside can be customized with your own message.
inside has the following message (but can be customized to fit your needs).

Thinking of you and hoping for a quick recovery. Remember to breathe. Take things one day at a time, and know that you are deeply loved. Price:$4.17

Review Get Well Soon, Take This One Day at a Time Card ($4.17)
